short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Focuses cursor in first text input if none is focused.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically focuses text input on websites allowing you to immediately write without using mouse. E.g. on Amazon.com cursor is focused on search text input.
